Constructor Detail

MultiPlayer

public MultiPlayer(int mode,
                   int difficulty,
                   int player1Code,
                   java.lang.String player1Name,
                   int player2Code,
                   java.lang.String player2Name)
Constructor of the class to create the maze MazeGame.

Parameters:
mode - the mode of the single game (ADVENTURE_MODE/COIN_MODE).
difficulty - the difficulty of the maze.
player1Code - the code representing the player 1's character.
player1Name - the name of the player 1.
player2Code - the code representing the player 2's character.
player2Name - the name of the player 2.
